1370: Rembrecht moved to Appel Marckt.A.0 after marriage.
Got married to Sywi at age 29 in 1370.
Had a son with Sywi, Hille, at age 29.
1371: Had a son with Sywi, Henric, at age 30.
1374: Had a son with Sywi, Richolfus, at age 33.
1377: Had a daughter with Sywi, Machtilden, at age 36.
1379: Had a daughter with Sywi, Sywi, at age 38.
1380: Had a son with Sywi, Bartholomeus, at age 39.
1382: Lost his wife Sywi while she was giving birth to Nellen in 1382.
1383: Lost son Bartholomeus when Bartholomeus was 4 years old.
